overview: Gaston is a young and enthusiastic entrepreneur, besides being an engineering student. Beyond his career, Gaston divides his time programming, designing and constantly thinking of new ideas and implementations for Adamo Design and La Plata Click, his newest ventures. He has worked as a clerk in the technology area of national and multinational companies and as freelancer for the past 3 years, combining his time with work. He has participated in several ventures, including Sistecorp.com, Clipids.com, Preclima.com, LaPlataClick.com and, as project lead and developer. Currently divides his time as an entrepreneur and computer geek, with his college career. A big challenge, but being willing to face it.
